VODescription.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOResource/v0.9 http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOResource/VOResource-v0.9.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOCommunity/v0.2 http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOCommunity/VOCommunity-v0.2.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VORegistry/v0.2 http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VORegistry/VORegistry-v0.2.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/ConeSearch/v0.2 http://www.ivoa.net/xml/ConeSearch/ConeSearch-v0.2.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SIA/v0.6 http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SIA/SIA-v0.6.xsd

Summary.Description: SuperCOSMOS Science Archive. Catalogue based on the ROE Schmidt sky survey plates

Column.Name: systemID
Column.Description: The system of survey fields used for the survey

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: The name of the system, eg. "ESO/SRC", "POSS-I" etc.

Column.Name: centrePitch
Column.Description: The pitch of the field centres

Table.Name: Survey

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: Unique survey identifier in the SSA

Column.Name: surveyName
Column.Description: Survey name, eg. SERC-J/EJ

Column.Name: systemID
Column.Description: The system of survey fields used for the survey

Column.Name: fieldOfView
Column.Description: The nominal field of view of each survey plate

Column.Name: decMin
Column.Description: Southern (Dec) limit of survey

Column.Name: decMax
Column.Description: Northern (Dec) limit of survey

Column.Name: numFields
Column.Description: No. of fields in the survey

Column.Name: telescope
Column.Description: UK, ESO or Palomar Oschin Schmidt

Column.Name: telAperture
Column.Description: Telescope aperture

Column.Name: telLong
Column.Description: Telescope longitude

Column.Name: telLat
Column.Description: Telescope latitude

Column.Name: telHeight
Column.Description: Telescope altitude

Column.Name: plateScale
Column.Description: Nominal plate scale

Column.Name: colour
Column.Description: Survey colour, eg. blue, red or near-infrared

Column.Name: waveMin
Column.Description: Approximate minimum wavelength

Column.Name: waveMax
Column.Description: Approximate maximum wavelength

Column.Name: waveEff
Column.Description: Approximate effective wavelength

Column.Name: magLimit
Column.Description: Nominal mag limit of survey, eg. 22.5 for Bj

Column.Name: epochMin
Column.Description: Minimum epoch of observations

Column.Name: epochMax
Column.Description: Maximum epoch of observations

Column.Name: epTsys
Column.Description: Time system for epoch values in SurveyCatalog

Column.Name: equinox
Column.Description: Equinox for positions in SurveyCatalog

Table.Column: eqTsysvarcharTime system for equinox in SurveyCatalogNOTE

Column.Name: surveyRef
Column.Description: Literature reference for survey

Column.Name: astResidY
Column.Description: Residual of astrometric fit in Y

Column.Description: No. of photometric calibration coefficients

Column.Name: CalXK
Column.Description: Stationary point in profile cal. curve

Column.Name: gradient
Column.Description: Gradient of linear portion of profile cal. curve

Column.Description: 1st profile calibration polynomial coefficient

Column.Name: sMag
Column.Description: Magnitude calculated on assumption object is star

Column.Name: SSAfield
Column.Description: SSS field number (ESO/SRC system) that this detection falls in.

Column.Name: seam
Column.Description: Seam index: = zero or SSAfield for seamless selection

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique object identification number from Detection

Column.Name: junkSource
Column.Description: Source of junk: 1=satellite track; 2=diffraction spike; 3=bright stellar halo

Column.Name: invSGDens
Column.Description: Local inverse star/galaxy density

Column.Name: trackAngle
Column.Description: Angle of track or diffraction spike

Column.Name: brightObjID
Column.Description: The Detection.objID of the artifact-inducing bright star

Column.Name: haloRadius
Column.Description: Vertical half-major axis of halo ellipse

Column.Name: postProb
Column.Description: Posterior probability of detection being junk

Table.Name: Source

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique identifier of merged source

Column.Name: objIDB
Column.Description: objID for B band detection merged into this object

Column.Name: objIDR1
Column.Description: objID for R1 band detection merged into this object

Column.Name: objIDR2
Column.Description: objID for R2 band detection merged into this object

Column.Name: objIDI
Column.Description: objID for I band detection merged into this object

Column.Name: htmId
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) of centroid

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Epoch of position (variance weighted mean epoch of available measures)

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Mean RA, computed from detections merged in this catalogue

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Mean Dec, computed from detections merged in this catalogue

Column.Name: sigRA
Column.Description: Uncertainty in RA (formal random error not inc. systematic errors)

Column.Name: sigDec
Column.Description: Uncertainty in Dec (formal random error not inc. systematic errors)

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: muAcosD
Column.Description: Proper motion in RA direction

Column.Name: muD
Column.Description: Proper motion in Dec direction

Column.Name: sigMuAcosD
Column.Description: Error on proper motion in RA direction

Column.Name: sigMuD
Column.Description: Error on proper motion in Dec direction

Column.Name: chi2
Column.Description: Chi-squared value of proper motion solution

Column.Name: Nplates
Column.Description: No. of plates used for this proper motion measurement

Column.Name: classMagB
Column.Description: B band magnitude selected by B image class

Column.Name: classMagR1
Column.Description: R1 band magnitude selected by R1 image class

Column.Name: classMagR2
Column.Description: R2 band magnitude selected by R2 image class

Column.Name: classMagI
Column.Description: I band magnitude selected by I image class

Column.Name: gCorMagB
Column.Description: B band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

Column.Name: gCorMagR1
Column.Description: R1 band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

Table.Column: gCorMagR2realR2 band magnitude assuming object is galaxymagPHOT_PHG_R

Column.Name: gCorMagI
Column.Description: I band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

Column.Name: sCorMagB
Column.Description: B band magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: sCorMagR1
Column.Description: R1 band magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: sCorMagR2
Column.Description: R2 band magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: sCorMagI
Column.Description: I band magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: meanClass
Column.Description: Estimate of image class based on unit-weighted mean of individual classes

Column.Name: classB
Column.Description: Image classification from B band detection

Column.Name: classR1
Column.Description: Image classification from R1 band detection

Column.Name: classR2
Column.Description: Image classification from R2 band detection

Column.Name: classI
Column.Description: Image classification from I band detection

Column.Name: ellipB
Column.Description: Ellipticity of B band detection

Column.Name: ellipR1
Column.Description: Ellipticity of R1 band detection

Column.Name: ellipR2
Column.Description: Ellipticity of R2 band detection

Column.Name: ellipI
Column.Description: Ellipticity of I band detection

Column.Name: qualB
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from B band detection

Column.Name: qualR1
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from R1 band detection

Column.Name: qualR2
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from R2 band detection

Column.Name: qualI
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from I band detection

Column.Name: blendB
Column.Description: Blend flag from B band detection

Column.Name: blendR1
Column.Description: Blend flag from R1 band detection

Column.Name: blendR2
Column.Description: Blend flag from R2 band detection

Column.Name: blendI
Column.Description: Blend flag from I band detection

Column.Name: prfStatB
Column.Description: Profile statistic from B band detection

Column.Name: prfStatR1
Column.Description: Profile statistic from R1 band detection

Column.Name: prfStatR2
Column.Description: Profile statistic from R2 band detection

Datatype.Description: Profile statistic from I band detection

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: The Galactic longitude of the source

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: The Galactic latitude of the source

Column.Name: d
Column.Description: The great-circle distance of the source from the Galactic centre

Column.Name: Ebmv
Column.Description: The estimated foreground reddening at this position from Schlegel et al. (1998)

Column.Name: systemID
Column.Description: Unique identifier of the system of survey field centres

Datatype.Description: Unique identifier of survey field (fieldNum and systemID combo)

Column.Description: ESO/SRC or Palomar survey system field number

Column.Name: nominalDec

Column.Name: htmId
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) of nominal field centre

Column.Description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Description: Unique identifier for the calibration version

Column.Description: Start date at which the calibration was released

Column.Name: endDate
Column.Description: End date at which the calibration was superseded

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: Short description of the calibration version

Column.Name: versionID
Column.Description: Unique identifier for the calibration version

Column.Description: Unique identifier of the plate

Column.Description: Fourth-order radial term in calibration
